text: aur agar tumhen (kisee baat par) taajjub hota hai to un kuphphaaron ko ye qaul taajjub kee baat hai ki jab ham (sadagal kar) mittee ho jaengen to kya ham (phir dobaara) ek naee jahannum mein aanaingen ye vahee log hain jinhonne apane paravaradigaar ke saath kuphr kiya aur yahee vah log hain jinakee gardanon mein (qayaamat ke din) tauq pade hogen aur yahee log jahannumee hain ki ye isamen hamesha rahegen
